values:
In other words, pretty damn well.
I think I have become quite spoiled. Call me crazy but I don't think it's wrong to be paranoid when you don't hear from your special someone for over 24 hrs, especially when the last time that happened it was because he was in the hands of the authorities. It just makes me lonely and feel dependent which is something I don't want to be. As of lately though, I can't be anything but that because I miss my brother a lot. I don't talk about his passing unless someone else brings it up. It only feels real when I think about it and all the good times we won't have anymore. He won't be able to raise my kids for me like he promised, he won't see me graduate from college, he won't be getting crunk with me on my 21st birthday, and he won't be there to ask me to drive him around in my mom's van while he vandalizes the streets of my hometown. This is me being selfish because I've only mentioned the things he's absent from in my life. He also won't be there in the lives of my two favorite midgets in the world, he's not going to live to see others pass before him. I have to that. He gets to be in heaven. He gets to know what it's like, unlike us down here, what it's like not to suffer. That's great right? Well down here I get to deal with the fleshly world and all its unknowns and all the plans I want to make but I'm too afraid of what will happen if I do. I'm afraid of losing something I think is good and not finding something as good or better. It just makes me want to hold tight because if not I'll lose it all. I fee like I should be grateful for what I have and not question it...and I am grateful and I have so many wonderful people in my life right now, but I'm also on a hunt to fill a void and that might not be possible.

so i just realized that i would never acknowldge love even if it stared me in the face and even to this day i would never say that i have ever truly been in love with someone. why? is probably what you are asking. well the answer i gave a good friend of mine was if i acknowledge that its love then there is the chance of losing it and losing "love" is not something i want to do. i get all too sad when i think about losing something as good as love... i mean i know its life, and i know you lose those you love eventually but if i just lose something "good," something that is a lot like "love" but not necessarily that then im safe. and i've never been one to play it safe, except for when it comes to my heart and i can just lie to myself and make feel a whole lot better in the end or for the meantime.  
just a thought.

here is a list of all that is therapeutic. to me that is.
1) reading. books. stuff about pseudoscience. ethics? let's stick with reading
2) talking about myself. suck it. but, i like being a good listener too ^_^
3)running/exercising
4)wasting time
5)listening to music
6)not doing homework
7)hip-hop
8)bumping my jams so you can feel the vibrations when you're down the hall. you know you liketed it.
9)bad punctuation
10)making lists
11)sending packages
12)making mix cds
13)laying on my back and pondering
14)lazy conversation
15)being a creeper
16)making lists
have a nice week lovelies. 
p.s. i think sage francis will be in austin very soon
don't expect me home soon if this is the case
it's a stake out to tell him how i really feel
i want to have his babies
or at least to get a picture with him
we'll talk about the babies later

so a lot of little things happened this week that made me just think of where i want and need to be in life right now 
i need to keep my door open 
i need to not dwell, if i could call it that at all... to not think of the what ifs and instead think of the could bes 

you said your vows and you closed the door, on so many men who could have loved you more 

to say it is one thing but to actually do it is another 

i need someone who will show me and so my door is fucking open! 

:) have a good holiday weekend ladies and gentlemen

So it's been a while but i figured i'd update to release some new year stress that isn't really there.
The break was amazing and eventful in saying the least.
Because it seems appropriate i'm gonna leach off of shelbums and tell people some of the lessons i've learned.
Lesson #1- Stop going back to relationships that can't work especially when another person is involved, just don't do it. As fun as it may be while youre are doing it, knowing that you have to leave in the end only makes things worse and learning the truth hurts more.
Lesson #2- Jesus thank you for the jams. All the hip hopz and folkz make me feel okay with life.
Lesson #3- Working out feels good, do it.
Lesson #4- Reading books makes me feel uber accomplished.

So... some goals of mine(mind you, not resolutions, but goals)
*READ MORE
*Pick a schedule for working out
*Get sleep
Talk to new people
*Cook more, food is good, especially when you cook it
Do my homework
*Have some adventures...road trips, write in a book, go to shows, stay up late and watch the stars...
Go to the capitol! I have to for my class I'm pretty excited too =D
Plan some badass programs for my girls
*pass it on

 

I really like this quote and its appropriate sadly.

"this is love? when you notice someone's absense and hate the absense more than anything? more, even than you love his presence?"

 

its the stupid fucking distance, im so over it. i have no choice.

home sweet home? far from that. more like home alone
because something feels like its missing.
i spent a record like 2.5 days in el paso and realized
how much sadness, hopefulness, optimism, joylessness, doubt,
and so many other negative and positive emotions were built up
in me and i really just couldn't take it.
i didn't really see anyone but family which was really good
but at the same time my little ones
being gone made everything feel so empty.
i like some others built up a lot of excitement for this trip
because i was going to see all the loves of my life, but no.

 
the lady took the baby, i know she loves the baby, but the baby has a daddy and his daddy loves him too,  how could she take the baby, maybe she's gone crazy, she won't share it's not fair, but there's nothing i can do.

Alas, my plans went to this place that kills things and doesn't know when they will let them come back.
i didn't see any of my lovelies. there will be christmas break for that though, you can only do so much in 2.5 days.
i did see my brother though and i had been waiting for that since i left because he has been through so much. i didn't know how he really was but i think he's going to be okay. i just need to pray for him and my family and hope that everything will be okay.
it has bee a shitty shitty year: no details are needed believe me; fuck that shit.
and worst of all how can you convince yourself that you don't care when you know what you feel is the closest thing to some kind of something that you have ever felt, and you have to leave it again, and again, and again, and again. i can tell you it's definitely not healthy HAH.
so for the next two weeks im shut up preparing for my demise that is finals that i know deep down will not be so bad and i will only lose sleep over which i would have lost anyway so good luck kids! 
and i'll stay up late and i won't even care that we're getting up early to go to the state fair i'm gonna ride the biggest ride it'll be out of sight and i'll share an elephanter with you if you like because we are alive so we've got live life to the fullest you spin the bottle and i'll dim the lights.


                        my brudder   and my odder brudder too

because i know you want me to know
and because i really want to know
tell me about your life right now
what are the ups and downs right now?
just thinking about you

but seriously i wasn't joking about that last one, this spin is far from over i know; and i am willing to twirl and go through the fire to help you because you are one of my heroes even if you always tell me that i think we both know the truth. i hope that you are enabled the strength to move on and get better and give your all to the ones you love because they deserve it. just stick with the ones you love because right now that is all you've got. and as i sit here, coffee in hand-something that i've convinced myself i dislike- attempting to catch up on life while it happens before my very eyes i just think these daily conversations are what get me by, because life is that simple. and i can't wait to see you, to see you all and i cant wait for life to continue because this is life and it has already started so make it happen even more and don't give up because if you do that will be the end of it you know.


Bring the smoke from the hills like you did round this time last year

so can you please tell me why it is that after all the times i've told you how much i love you and everyone else has too, you take us all for a spin and we wind up in the same exact place exhausted and tired and not wanting to give it another go...

it's not much, but:
has there ever been a moment in your life when you realized you just were not bored anymore? 
sometimes i feel like there is not enough time to fit everythig into it anymore but it's actually pretty fantastic. between doing ra stuff, working at the coffee shop, goen to classes and playing flag football i swear there is no in between. but seriously it is nothing like home i mean, not that home is a bad thing its just everything is non-stop right now. i seriously thought to myself the whole almost two months ive been here have been filled and not once have i stopped and thought to myself that i was bored so...


So touch me or don’t
Just let me know Where you’ve been
We could leave it alone,
I’m sure there’s someone who knows
Where you’ve been
You never worked well with our group
Not with the faults we found
So we fixed you with cement galoshes
No one can save you now
Unless you have friends among fish
There’ll still be no air to breathe
You could drink up the entire ocean
I’ll still find someone to be everything we know that you’ll never be

So i'll be heading back soon and i'm more ready then ever. Things have been good
people have been good, new friendships have been good, good time indeed. I've
taken to becoming more of a sentimental type and i'm gonna miss a lot of people
but on the road again is where i need to be because as cliche as it sounds i'm free 
there. The summer is almost over for me now; a new fresh slate for the taking!

so this one  goes in for the books.
i was never one of those people who was
able to truly sympathiz with someone who 
recently had a love one pass away.
the only thing that came close was my 
chinchilla dying a year and a hald ago
and dont get me wrong he was badass
but he was my pet right?
well now i truly know what it feels like and the
first thing that comes to mind is that is some
true surreal shit. i don't want any of the im sorry's
because that shit don't cut it you know? it's done
but i do appreciate them. instead can i have your
prayers? even if you don't pray that would be even
more appreciate :) on sunday morning i got a call
from my hermano saying "hey... ... ...honey has gone to heaven... ... ..."
my first reaction seriously was to ask if he was serious.
i can truly say i didn't see this one coming any time soon.
i really see everyone in my family as invincible at least 
in my head, but now i know i deal with death pretty well
it just wont sink in that shes's gone anyway and i find myself
thinking about it all the time and everytime someone says anything
i have to interject with a yea my grandma does that or
she used to do that... yea she was pretty much a badass. not 
gonna lie. so now i know there may be no way to comfort someone
i can only comfort myself, i listen to sad songs that make me
want to cry more but im still okay you know? im okay, im gonna be okay 
because i know she's in heaven and it gives me peace to 
know that she wont have to see the end of this world in her time 
because she's won like the eternal sweepstakes in heaven 
and now the rest of us are screwed. my mom told me it was okay
because we all loved her lots and she loved us too and we all know she
is in heaven and it's just gonna be difficult for us but she is not 
in any pain at least. well i said "thats the most fucked up part about it"
the grieving process is some fucked up shiiitt! but i can LOL at that one
because i dont have to get over it and i dont have to go insane either
but here's to virginia kennedy strader not sure her birthdate haha
but r.i.p. in sunday april 13th at some time in the late morning.
my say on it :shes the baddest of BA's i know:

okay so its almost 2 in the morning and while everyone else in the world has gone to bed, tired and disgusted by studying for finals and such i am done! 
i arielle kassner am done with high school forever, well almost. ive still got to get my yearbook and have it signed by everyone i love and care about, wear my gown tomorrow, clear and most importantly graduate haha.

anywhoo.... i am up at this very moment, well clearly because i cant sleep and chiefly i have a few things to complain and rant about because this is livejournal ey!

damn oh man i should not have messed with all the bumps on my forehead cause now it looks like i have the chicken pox or somthing haha, hmm there are worse things i could do as rizzo once said. yeah man i hate my skin.

hmmm another reason i am up may be due to the overwhelming anticipation in finding out if i stayed in top ten. im pretty scared about that actually... at one time in my life i didnt care about it because i wasnt even top twenty my sophomore year right???? gah though it is too too stiff this competition of mine and i must admit that it wouldnt matter if i made top ten cause im going to college right? NO, hah i want it so bad actually. me the one who really does not enjoy drawing attention to myself at church because i am a sinner, me who is a shy public speaker. i want that honor, its selfish i guess but it is making me nervous

mainly cause my group crapped out on a final project and who knows what kind of a grade i'll muster in that class now, GAH! i havent let myself think about it all weekend but dayum!
on a lighter note we are getting yearbooks tomorrow ey!

so im going to st eds in the fall jic some of you didnt know by now
i dont know where else to go with this i was thinking about making an awesome end of year post, but those are usually for new years and such.

its the end of the world as we know it
haha and i totally dies laughing cause
memento mori (remember you will die) something like that i wrote in my freshemen letter
and i think thats what i'll go do! read, cause i miss doing that :D

So i want to update but i have nothing to say

Anywhoooo the major reason why im making this post is becuse of the feaky dreams that ive been having and actually remembering. It scares me a little in a sense.
So one of the main things about my dreams is i keep dreaming im pregnant or that i think im pregnant and im scared as hell in the dream. Other things are that theres this one person who kept trying to convince me we had sex and i didnt remember anything becuase i was drunk, but that it didnt hurt or something. And then i was freaked out about being pregnant again. Also in that dream this random guy from Burgess showed up in it and i liked him but had the other guy who i supposedly had sex with hang around in my way.
And last nights dream was extremely freaky in the sense that i was pregnant and felt it and it was weird! Like i could feel the child inside me and the swollen belly.
I have no idea what to make of this but im tired of having these dreams
and i am totally not having sex any time soon.
Got any ideas?

You guys this year has been amazing i agree with dominique :) Its had its ups and downs yea, i think imma do the short paragraph like shelba and let some pics speak for themselves.

So last new years eve i started the year off with EJ! he's a great kid we all love him! Ive watched tons and tons of awesome movies, did OAP and was a crazy convulsing ho on stage. i cant wait for this years :), We said goodbye to some lovely alumni and we miss them so, IM A SENIOR NOW! whoa, theatre has been awesome despite all the crazy new hooligans( i dont mean that in a good way like the movie i came to be obsessed with over a period of time. i think ove eaten a lot more chinese too actually cause of dominique. we've had a couple adventures in the park late at night too. remember the walk home this summer domino? car rides with my two weasel drivers too! elisa and dominique. gotten closer to all my chikas :) met some new people and formed some awesome new friendships. I rode my bike to judsons house one day and we spent the day together. i asked kyle to marry over the summer too i think he's my husband now. HMMMM i was a dr. and a chinese man, cant wait to see whats next~~~ i recently learned this year that im TOP 10 in ma class, i think thats real cool too, a hellavan accomplishment if i may say so myself.oh man my house got robbed that sucked! and hmmm everthing got stolen so i had to start over ive had two cameras and mine broke twice too,,, now you cant see the pictures you take. i got an ipod and its music is love and helps me sleep that thing is so totally coming to college with me. i went without headphones bc of some stupid caca head  and i almost died. we've jad a few trips ;) quite more then i planned for at least. Ive been going to church more and i love my gurlies. I really do love God despite everything and i may not agree with everything the church( christian, catholic, ect) stands for but my beliefs are in him and thats what matters. this is turning out to be a long paragraph. its weird how people drift from each other and other people take their place. i cant wait till this year so i can make the most of it in every aspect because there are a lot of new things coming my way..........a big one is college. PEACE To my gurls and Patty and all my invincible jew boys too:D i cant name you all cause it would take too long but all of you are LOVE

Among women, cola beverages were associated with lower bone mineral density.


The researchers looked at bone mineral density at three different hip sites, as well as the spine.

They found that in women, drinking cola was associated with lower bone mineral density at all three hip sites, regardless of age, menopause, total calcium and vitamin D intake, or smoking or drinking alcohol

Women should limit their caffeine intake, Zaidi said. "Caffeine interferes with calcium absorption, which results in less bone formation," he said.

This can be a problem for younger women who never develop peak bone density, Zaidi noted. "Younger women who have a lot of coke will not form bone to an extent their peers would; so, years later, in menopause, they are going to be disadvantaged," he said.i dont want none of that shii
